title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder instead of the expected alias name.
EB: According to SCR 78193, the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select the dataset.
3. Double-click the first column name.

Expected result: The alias name should appear as row["column1"] after double-clicking the original name.
